component.name: XIVLauncher
component.summary: Launcher & seamless Linux integration for Final Fantasy XIV Online

description.p: XIVLauncher is a custom launcher for FINAL FANTASY XIV that offers painless patching, a customized WINE version for perfect compatibility with FFXIV and multitude of useful plugins. Install, log in, patch, and get started!

Note: This flatpak will not work perfectly with Steam due to flatpak limitations. Please see our Linux and Steam Deck FAQ linked under the help tab for more information and an alternative install options.
